question: Who is representing India at the  2019 Indo Pacific Chiefs of Defence (CHOD) Conference in Bangkok?
explanation: Air Chief Marshal Birender Singh Dhanoa is representing India at the  2019 Indo Pacific Chiefs of Defence (CHOD) Conference in Bangkok, Thailand.  The theme for the conference is \"Collaboration in a free and Open Indo - Pacific\". The conference will provide perspectives on common challenges faced by attending nations and elicit open discussions on the same. More than Chiefs of Defence of 33 countries are participating in the conference.
